content.raw:
Another question:

“The python script would subscribe to the task message to determine what task is being run“, is the task message from the “/vrx/task/info“ rostopic?

If it is, the name of the task5 and task6 are same  - > scan\_dock.

Is there other rostopic to get the task message?

‌
